short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension will generate face data reports for the meetings conducted on Microsoft Teams.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will record your webcam stream and will provide you the facial analytics data in the form of report at the end of your meeting. The report will show you the engagement  and mood graph through the meeting you have taken.
